shortdesc.p: Do you have a sweet tooth but eat vegan? No worries. These two recipes are sure to make you happy!
Makes 6 eight-inch waffles. You will need a mixing bowl, whisk, measuring cups and a waffle iron.
A perfect healthy vegan breakfast that you can take on the go! You will need a blender to mix together all of the ingredients and measuring cups/spoons.
If you love a delicious savory dish for breakfast, look no further than these two recipes!
This quick & easy recipe requires a stove, pan, spatula, measuring spoons, a knife and a toaster.

shortdesc.p: This recipe takes 5 minutes and is sure to satisfy a hungry vegan looking for breakfast! You'll need a toaster, measuring cups and a knife.
